title: When you are playing a role you said you were bad at
body:
Then your team tells you that you are bad at that role 
https://media.giphy.com/media/l2352hJxgVVu0/giphy.gif

replies.body: The only Support I play is {{champion:89}} Thresh can go fk himself.

> [{quoted}](name=9kPluzZ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KNdPju4M,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-10-20T23:48:34.973+0000)
>
> who is that? Shes beautiful.

i think its the real housewifes of something...
That would be me as ADC. I mean I've gotten a lot better over the years. But really I'm just not good as ADC.

same here, ADC is and will always be my worst position to play, mainly because of the mechanics.  So usually if i have to play ADC i go Sivir unless i am just messing around or want to play somebody else.  Thats because Sivir is my all around best adc.  There are other ones i can do good with, but they are more situational choices then anything.
It's like you should be a detective...

Best you can do is last hit, freeze lane, and show up for teamfights if you suck at a particular role. On one hand, I have a lot of sympathy for people who are bad at dueling (dealing with bruiser bullies top lane is definitely my weakness), so if they're up against someone like Riven or Garen who have ridiculous dueling and chasing potential, I wouldn't blame them for being a bit behind. On the other hand when they're feeding the fuck out of the enemy Nasus I just wonder what the hell they're doing and why they keep going back to fight when they're already several kills behind.
Me as an ADC. Had an awful ranked game as twitch. Now I'm amazing at Quinn ADC. Funny how that can work.
Bird is the Word Master Race.

I find it amusing that I've found Quinn actually works best with Azir mid, so yes, bird is the word.

don't let ur memes be dreams

Got forced into jungle and for the first time I didn't dodge... So I went amumu because.. you know... amumu is good... then I got destroyed by the Yi counterpick.

lessons learned

Me as support
They made me go Leona once... I was feeding and I couldn't do anything about it :/
Whenever I'm forced to jungle.
Me as adc
This is why learned to play every single role so i would be able to fill+maining support since i love this role and that not alot of people will call: support or feed in normal
